articles.content: There was a lot of waiting, and watching, and more of the same, before the game was called off  •  Getty Images

articles.author: Kunal Kishore
articles.title: 'I rotate strike well against spin' - Gill open to middle-order role in ODIs - ESPNcricinfo
articles.description: In order to get more opportunities, he is willing to move down the order in Tests as well
articles.content: Abhishek Sharma ready for reboot, with a little help from Lara, Dravid and Yuvraj

articles.author: ICC
articles.title: Culture shock: West Indies great has his say on what went wrong in Australia - T20 World Cup
articles.description: Two-time ICC Men's T20 World Cup winning captain Daren Sammy has revealed where he thinks it all went wrong for the West Indies at this year's event and what the Caribbean side needs to do to become a powerhouse again.
articles.content: Two-time ICC Men's T20 World Cup winning captain Daren Sammy has revealed where he thinks it all went wrong for the West Indies at this year's event and what the Caribbean side needs to do to become … [+3330 chars]

articles.title: T20 WC 2022: Marcus Stoinis and the 'feel' factor | Australia vs England | Cricbuzz.com - Cricbuzz
articles.description: His knock against Sri Lanka made the dressing room and home crowds believe again. Australia will need some more of that from Stoinis against England
articles.content: Marcus Stoinis is a 'feel' player. Even if it might not be in keeping with the various machismo-oozing monikers that get brandished around for him, from the Hulk to the Big Rig and even The Predator.… [+4521 chars]
